parameters.text:
## ðŸ“Œ Prompt for AI Agent

> **Task:** You are an AI email assistant.
>
> **Goal:**
>
> * Collect all emails from my Outlook inbox (`nkonduri@iu.edu`) for the current day.
> * Read through the subject and body of each email.
>  Summarize each email into short bullet points
> * Group the bullet points into categories (journals) with clear **headings**, such as:
>
>   * Jobs & Career
>   * University / Academic
>   * News
>   * Sports
>   * Entertainment
>   * Travel
>   * Finance
>   * Personal / Other
> * If an email does not clearly belong to one of the above, put it under **Other**.
>
> **Output Format:**
>
> * Use bold **headings** for each category.
> * Under each heading, provide bullet point summaries.
> * Be concise, no extra text outside the structured summary.
> give me the output in text format
>
> **Example Output:**
>
> **Jobs & Career**
>
> * New internship opportunity at XYZ Corp, apply by Sept 15.
> * Recruiter follow-up about interview scheduling.
>
> **University / Academic**
>
> * Reminder: Assignment 3 is due on Sept 10.
> * University newsletter shared updates about research grants.
>
> **News**
>
> * Global markets rise slightly after economic data release.
>
> **Entertainment**
>
> * Netflix announced new documentary release.
>
> **Sports**
>
> * IU basketball team wins season opener.
>
> **Travel**
>
> * Airline shared offers on student travel discounts.
>
> **Other**
>
> * Random promotional email about discounts.
>
> **Final Action:**
> Send this summarized and categorized report as a single email to **[nkonduri@iu.edu](mailto:nkonduri@iu.edu)** at the end of each day.

---

This way your **AI Agent node** will:

1. Pull todayâ€™s Outlook emails.
2. Summarize + categorize.
3. Send you the summary at **[nkonduri@iu.edu](mailto:nkonduri@iu.edu)** automatically.

nodes.name: Send a message in Microsoft Outlook
